channel.title: A Giude For New Server Makers
channel.description:
Ok I Made My Very First Server Last Month, Well it wasn't really mine because its leeched but it was start i guess :| the easiest way to make your server is by using a hamachi based one, if you dont know where to get hamachi or you dont have the program another link is provided here..
[url=http://forum.ragezone.com/f364/release-download-list-release-breath-333792/]http://forum.ragezone.com/f364/release-download-list-release-breath-333792/[/url]
This also has a [b]HUGE[/b] list of sources you can download to start you server, the link for hamachi is given close to the bottom of the topic, the process for downloading shouldn't take too long, but be patient because it may..
Now then you have your source and you have hamachi now this is next of what you need to do, you know that ip at the top of the hamachi screen? Well thats going to be the ip for your server, but wait! There is more to be done... You need to create a network for people to join, if no one joins this no one can play, so i suggest advertising it on YouTube Or on The Mopar hamachi server status's ([url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/hamachi.php]www.moparisthebest.com/hamachi.php[/url]) now you have the network setted up you can now run your server! now it should be accessable for everyone to play! There Should be a file in your source that says "Runserver.bat" double click and leave it on or else the server cannot be accessed! Here Are Some Of The Clients You Can Play It On
[url=http://www.client.silabsoft.org]www.client.silabsoft.org[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com]www.moparisthebest.com[/url]
I Hope This Helped You In Some Way, If You Want To Edit It More Then Look Through Your Source And See WhatYou Can Do, Some Of It Reqiures JDK 5.0 or Higher..

item.title: A Giude For New Server Makers
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

I Br3ndan I:

That’s because these kind of threads are easy on the eyes and easy to identify- easy pickings for any moderator. I’m not trying to fight for this thread’s right to be here. I’m just saying that these threads help the odd person, here and there.

You do have a point there thought, it really just depends how and who.

Read full topic

it all depends on how your pc runs…

item.title: A Giude For New Server Makers
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

I Br3ndan I:

Actually, there’s a hell of a lot of people who have problems with the configuration of Hamachi. Sometimes a little simplicity goes a long way; those big threads made by the moderators can be extremely confusing to the newbie.

Hamachi fucks up my internet, makes it time out.
So hamachi sucks balls.

But still, Moderators say there’s enough of these.

Read full topic
item.source: A Giude For New Server Makers

item.title: A Giude For New Server Makers
item.dc:creator: @benzo_yay benzo yay
item.description:
@benzo_yay wrote:

True, But As That Other Guy Said Allot Of People Will Start To Struggle, But Allot Of People Dont I Am Just Here To Help Those Who Dont Know How To Even Make One.

Read full topic
